about.title: Who I am and what I do
about.description:
Technology professional with over 10 years of experience, I've worked in various IT areas, from customer support to systems and infrastructure maintenance. Currently, I’m focused on web development with experience in technologies like JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, MongoDB, and GraphQL.

Over the past year and a half, I’ve worked on both backend and frontend, seeking to improve my skills and learn from senior professionals. If you’re looking for a dedicated junior full stack developer with a solid technical foundation, you’ve just found one!

description: As a junior full stack developer, I work with technologies like MongoDB, Node.js, React, TypeScript, GraphQL, and RESTful APIs.
I actively participate in training and pair programming sessions with senior developers, which has accelerated my technical growth.
I have a solid foundation in agile methodologies, focusing on the Scrum framework as taught in the book Scrum Essentials.
I contribute to both backend and frontend tasks using React. We use Bitbucket for version control and Figma for visual component standards.
Corporate customer service, network and systems incident analysis and resolution.
Promoted three times for exceptional performance.
Actively led a technical support team of 5 members.
Created technical documentation and trained new employees.
Maintenance of hardware and software in computers and notebooks.
Installation and configuration of local networks.
Inventory management of parts and equipment.
